item.title: About
item.description: Contact me Email: kov4l3nko@gmail.com (you can use my PGP public key) Twitter: @kov4l3nko GitHub: @kov4l3nko About the blog I started blogging in 2012 on Google Blogger platform. That old blog is still alive, but not updated anymore. It contains several technical articles, but in general it’s not a technical blog. In 2013 I bought the codedigging.com domain and started a self-hosted technical blog about reverse engineering of mobile applications.
